abstracts.cdata!:
The project includes: at Sangster
            airport, expansion of passenger terminal and aircraft apron
            facilities, and completion of taxiway; at Norman Manley
            airport, modifications to passenger terminal, improved
            aircraft apron facilities, and lengthening of runway;
            related infrastructure works at both airports; supply of
            navigational and other equipment; and consulting services
            for design and supervision of construction and for improving
            financial, management and accounting systems.
